<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/experiments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new experiment with variants, context and conditions. You can optionally specify metrics and experiment group for tracking and analysis.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-workspace","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"experiment_type":{"type":"string","enum":["DEFAULT","DELETE_OVERRIDES"],"title":"ExperimentType"},"context":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Represents conditional criteria used for context matching. Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.","title":"Condition"},"variants":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"variant_type":{"type":"string","enum":["CONTROL","EXPERIMENTAL"],"title":"VariantType"},"context_id":{"type":"string"},"override_id":{"type":"string"},"overrides":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Configuration overrides that replace default values when context conditions are met. Keys represent configuration keys and values are the override data.","title":"Overrides"}},"required":["id","overrides","variant_type"],"title":"Variant"}},"description":{"type":"string"},"change_reason":{"type":"string"},"metrics":{},"experiment_group_id":{"type":"string"}},"required":["change_reason","context","description","name","variants"],"title":"CreateExperimentRequestContent"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.","title":"Condition"},"variants":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"variant_type":{"type":"string","enum":["CONTROL","EXPERIMENTAL"],"title":"VariantType"},"context_id":{"type":"string"},"override_id":{"type":"string"},"overrides":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Configuration overrides that replace default values when context conditions are met.
